transcript: a lot of private Equity firms entire Playbook circles around going in buying the assets firing everyone and then putting those assets in another company that is not our Playbook this is not to say PE is evil it's just that they are different business models it's a capital Market you can do whatever you want the way we wanted to approach it was simple legal conversations not negotiation keeping the founders involved after the transaction allowing them to participate meaningfully in all the upside that we're going to create and not materially changing the business or only doing that if it's Last Resort and not Our intention
